DataElement.preferredName: First-Line Therapy Biological Therapy Receive Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to receiving the preferred standard treatment for a particular condition as the therapeutic action to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process for a tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to receiving the preferred standard treatment for a particular condition as the therapeutic action to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process for a tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

Concepts.definition: The preferred standard treatment for a particular condition.

Property.preferredDefinition: Biological therapy is a form of treatment that implies the administration of substances which produce a biological reaction in the organism enhancing or restoring the host immune response, modifying the behavior of cancer cells, blocking the pathways of cell neoplastic transformation and tumor ability to metastasize, or facilitating the repairment of cells damaged by aggressive forms of cancer treatment.  It includes the use of sera, antitoxins, vaccines, genes, cells, tissues, and organs:To take, accept, or got something offered.

Concepts.definition: A type of treatment that uses substances derived from or made by living organisms to treat disease; this includes both naturally occurring and synthetic products.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient received any
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any biologic (non-cytotoxic) therapy as part of their primary treatment regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received any non-cytotoxic therapy (such as bevacizumab) as part of their primary treatment regimen?
